name: Wrong Way Moto Racer
description:
Wrong Way Moto Racer is an entertaining racing game from BigCode FREE Games. Have you ever tried racing in the wrong direction on highway with full speed in a high traffic area??? We have created a special type of the racing game just for our lovely racers who race on highway. Oops!!! This game is all about racing in the wrong direction filled with huge vehicles ready to smash you. Try your best to avoid accidents & race till the end. Challenge your friends to beat your score & prove their racing skills. So, you have to try hard to get the best high score & win the race. Share your scores to avail surprises. It's a tuff & challenging game!!! So, racers get ready for an ultimate action & racing adventure on road. Are you ready racers??? Speed up to enjoy the coolest yet craziest racing game of the year.

Download & Play Wrong Way Moto Racer game for our crazy racers.

Wrong Way Moto Racer Features:

*Its a Free Racing Game
*Realistic graphics and sound effects
*Highly Addictive with coolest features
*Unlock a variety of new bikes to race
*10+ Crazy bikes to race
*Endless racing for endless fun
*Avoid crashing for as long as possible
*Simple and enjoyable racing gameplay
*Share your scores through Instagram, Facebook, &Twitter
*Collect your daily rewards

If you love Wrong Way Moto Racer, please do leave a comment.
